attributes.action: Campaign for the repair and restoration of Brightons Victorian bandstand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Located in a Neighbourhood Renewal and Regeneration area.
The bandstand has been become an eyesore  on the seafront for many visitors and residents. 
The 'Birdcage' bandstand built in 1884 it served the public in two ways - by providing music to the Kings Road level, whilst offering toilet facilities to promenaders on the Western lower esplanade.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
